nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_158
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: No matter how high your IQ is, your view is limited by the experience you have had and so you should learn to incorporate the useful perspectives of others.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_159
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: So interesting was the game that none of them took note of the passage of time.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_160
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I've been sorting through these old documents to see which are useful and which can be thrown away.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_161
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: As you get older you should reflect on future plans.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_162
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: His appearance in the show was nothing less than a sensation.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_163
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Every month they set aside a particular amount of money from their salary for the sake of their kid's education in the future.
